review: I have two older Roku devices that I love. But after discovering that the Fire TV Stick could operate KODI, I bought the stick when it was on sale. This sucker is FAST! You can zip through all the channels and have a movie or tv show playing in no-time! I installed Kodi and have been on a movie watching binge...I cannot get enough of this thing. Best money I ever spent for entertainment...I totally recommend!UPDATE 8/24/2015: Still loving my Fire Stick-just bought another one! Get yur Kodi on!
